# reschola

The goal of reschola is to support the workflow for data analysis at
[Schola Empirica](http://scholaempirica.org) through a set of templates,
themes, utilities, and documentation. The vignettes for the package
document the Schola Empirica way of doing data analysis and provide
guidance and tips on tools and good practice.

## Installation

You can install the *released* version of reschola from
[Github](https://github.com) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github(
  "scholaempirica/reschola",
  ref = remotes::github_release(),
  build_vignettes = TRUE
)
```

`r-universe` is kindly building and hosting compiled binaries of the
current *development versions* for Windows and MacOS, so you can proceed
with a standard call with `r-universe` repository specified:

``` r
install.packages("reschola", repos = "https://scholaempirica.r-universe.dev")
```

This could be done with `remotes` as well, by ommiting the `ref`
argument:

``` r
remotes::install_github("scholaempirica/reschola", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## What is inside the box and how to use it

See the [Getting
started](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/reschola.md)
vignette
([`vignette('reschola', package = 'reschola')`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/reschola.md))
for an overview of templates, utilities and guidance in this package
that together provide the infrastructure and mental models for the
Schola Empirica way of working with data and reporting.

## Acknowledgments

All content in this package arose out of conversations with the guys at
Schola Empirica and their desire to do data analysis well.

The tools and concepts contained in it are heavily inspired by many
wonderful members of the R community; references to specific
contributions are contained in individual vignettes.

Logo made using <https://connect.thinkr.fr/hexmake/>. The approach to
project templates and some other components is heavily inspired by
[ratlas](https://github.com/atlas-aai/ratlas/), including the reuse of
components from [hrbrthemes](https://hrbrmstr.github.io/hrbrthemes/).

# Package index

## Workflow helpers

Other tools for streamlining work

- [`draft_pdf()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/draft.md)
  [`draft_word()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/draft.md)
  :

  Create a `.Rmd` draft using Schola templates

- [`gd_download_folder()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/gd_download_folder.md)
  : Download files from Google Drive folder

- [`manage_docx_header_logos()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/manage_docx_header_logos.md)
  : Add or replace logo in the header of a Word document

## Making charts

Tools for making charts in ggplot2

- [`flush_axis`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/flush_axis.md)
  : A shorcut for making axis text flush with axis

- [`plot_lollipop()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/plot_lollipop.md)
  **\[maturing\]** : Plot lollipop

- [`prepare_lollipop_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/prepare_lollipop_data.md)
  **\[maturing\]** :

  Prepare data for
  [`plot_lollipop()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/plot_lollipop.md)

- [`schola_barplot()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_barplot.md)
  **\[maturing\]** : Plot standard Schola likert-like barplot with
  groupwise comparison per items

- [`theme_schola()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/theme_schola.md)
  : A Schola Empirica ggplot2 theme

## Report templates and output

Rmarkdown templates, output formats and helpers

- [`copy_schola_template()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/copy_schola_template.md)
  : Copy default Schola template into project directory
- [`open_schola_template()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/open_schola_template.md)
  : Locate and open default Schola templates
- [`schola_pdf()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_pdf.md)
  : Schola Empirica PDF Format
- [`schola_word()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_word.md)
  : Basic Schola Empirica Word document
- [`schola_word2()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_word2.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Schola Empirica Word document with customisable
  template

## Font helpers and shortcuts

Tools for installing, setting and using fonts contained in reschola

- [`import_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/import_fonts.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Import Ubuntu fonts for use in charts and in the
  PDF reports
- [`install_reschola_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/install_reschola_fonts.md)
  : Install reschola fonts on your computer
- [`register_reschola_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/register_reschola_fonts.md)
  **\[stable\]** : Register reschola fonts on Windows
- [`use_reschola_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/use_reschola_fonts.md)
  [`set_reschola_ggplot_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/use_reschola_fonts.md)
  : Make ggplot2 use font(s) in text-based geoms

## LimeSurvey API functions

rescholaâ€™s own API to LimeSurvey with useful shortcuts

- [`ls_add_participants()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_add_participants.md)
  : Add Participant(s) to the Survey
- [`ls_call()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_call.md)
  : Call LimeSurvey API Directly
- [`ls_export()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_export.md)
  : Export Responses with Participants Attached
- [`ls_get_attrs()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_get_attrs.md)
  : Get Survey Attributes in Semantic Form
- [`ls_invite()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_invite.md)
  : Invite Participant(s)
- [`ls_login()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_login.md)
  : Login to LimeSurvey API
- [`ls_participants()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_participants.md)
  : List Participants
- [`ls_responses()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_responses.md)
  : Export Responses
- [`ls_set_participant_properties()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_set_participant_properties.md)
  : Set or Edit Attribute(s) of an Participant
- [`ls_surveys()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_surveys.md)
  : List All Surveys at the Server

## All functions alphabetically

All functions, including uncategorised ones

- [`as_czech_date()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/as_czech_date.md)
  :

  Make Date of Class `czech_date`

- [`compile_and_open()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/compile_and_open.md)
  : Safely Compile RMarkdown Document(s)

- [`copy_schola_template()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/copy_schola_template.md)
  : Copy default Schola template into project directory

- [`czech_date_interval()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/czech_date_interval.md)
  : Czech Date Interval

- [`dict_from_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/dict_from_data.md)
  : Get item code-label dictionary from data

- [`draft_pdf()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/draft.md)
  [`draft_word()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/draft.md)
  :

  Create a `.Rmd` draft using Schola templates

- [`extract_schola_barplot_info()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/extract_schola_barplot_info.md)
  : Extract detailed info from Schola barplot

- [`fct_nanify()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/fct_nanify.md)
  : NAnify factor level

- [`flush_axis`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/flush_axis.md)
  : A shorcut for making axis text flush with axis

- [`label_percent_cz()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/formatscz.md)
  [`label_number_cz()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/formatscz.md)
  : Czech formatted scales for ggplot2

- [`gd_download_folder()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/gd_download_folder.md)
  : Download files from Google Drive folder

- [`gd_get_proj()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/gd_get_proj.md)
  : Get current reschola project Google Drive URL ID

- [`gd_upload_file()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/gd_upload_file.md)
  : Upload a file to project's Google Drive

- [`get_labs_df()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/get_labs_df.md)
  : Get labels of variables

- [`import_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/import_fonts.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Import Ubuntu fonts for use in charts and in the
  PDF reports

- [`install_reschola_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/install_reschola_fonts.md)
  : Install reschola fonts on your computer

- [`ls_add_participants()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_add_participants.md)
  : Add Participant(s) to the Survey

- [`ls_call()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_call.md)
  : Call LimeSurvey API Directly

- [`ls_check_attributes()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_check_attributes.md)
  : Check for Illegal Attributes

- [`ls_export()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_export.md)
  : Export Responses with Participants Attached

- [`ls_get_attrs()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_get_attrs.md)
  : Get Survey Attributes in Semantic Form

- [`ls_invite()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_invite.md)
  : Invite Participant(s)

- [`ls_login()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_login.md)
  : Login to LimeSurvey API

- [`ls_participants()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_participants.md)
  : List Participants

- [`ls_responses()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_responses.md)
  : Export Responses

- [`ls_set_participant_properties()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_set_participant_properties.md)
  : Set or Edit Attribute(s) of an Participant

- [`ls_standardize_dates()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_standardize_dates.md)
  : Standardize Date Variables in LimeSurvey Data

- [`ls_surveys()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/ls_surveys.md)
  : List All Surveys at the Server

- [`manage_docx_header_logos()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/manage_docx_header_logos.md)
  : Add or replace logo in the header of a Word document

- [`open_schola_template()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/open_schola_template.md)
  : Locate and open default Schola templates

- [`plot_lollipop()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/plot_lollipop.md)
  **\[maturing\]** : Plot lollipop

- [`prepare_lollipop_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/prepare_lollipop_data.md)
  **\[maturing\]** :

  Prepare data for
  [`plot_lollipop()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/plot_lollipop.md)

- [`recover_labs()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/recover_labs.md)
  [`` `%labs_from%` ``](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/recover_labs.md)
  : Recover lost labels from same-structured tibble with labels

- [`register_reschola_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/register_reschola_fonts.md)
  **\[stable\]** : Register reschola fonts on Windows

- [`remove_empty_at()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/remove_empty_at.md)
  : Remove rows empty only at specified columns

- [`scale_x_percent_cz()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/scalescz.md)
  [`scale_y_percent_cz()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/scalescz.md)
  [`scale_x_number_cz()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/scalescz.md)
  [`scale_y_number_cz()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/scalescz.md)
  : Continuous scales with Czech percent labels

- [`schola_barplot()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_barplot.md)
  **\[maturing\]** : Plot standard Schola likert-like barplot with
  groupwise comparison per items

- [`schola_labeller()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_labeller.md)
  : Labeller with width wrapping and item code-label dictionary

- [`schola_pdf()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_pdf.md)
  : Schola Empirica PDF Format

- [`get_input_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_rds.md)
  [`get_intermediate_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_rds.md)
  [`get_processed_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_rds.md)
  [`write_input_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_rds.md)
  [`write_intermediate_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_rds.md)
  [`write_processed_data()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_rds.md)
  :

  Quick access to data in standard `reschola` project

- [`schola_word()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_word.md)
  : Basic Schola Empirica Word document

- [`schola_word2()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/schola_word2.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Schola Empirica Word document with customisable
  template

- [`sten()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/sten.md)
  : Transform to STEN score (Standard Ten)

- [`theme_schola()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/theme_schola.md)
  : A Schola Empirica ggplot2 theme

- [`use_reschola_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/use_reschola_fonts.md)
  [`set_reschola_ggplot_fonts()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/use_reschola_fonts.md)
  : Make ggplot2 use font(s) in text-based geoms

- [`with_clr()`](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/reference/with_clr.md)
  : Create HTML span tag with text and color style

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Making
  charts](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/charts.md):

- [Developing this package
  further](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/meta.md):

- [Getting
  started](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/reschola.md):

- [Setup
  guide](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/setup.md):

  Getting everything ready for work

- [Tips and Tricks for R and
  Rstudio](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/tips.md):

  Tips and tricks for working with R in RStudio

- [The
  Workflow](https://scholaempirica.github.io/reschola/articles/workflow.md):

  The Schola Empirica Workflows: Principles, Tools, Step-by-Step Guide
